markdownRemark.html:
We don’t choose our parents. I know most haven’t reflected on the fact that being born to this world is not of our own choosing. Okay, religious people will credit a “creator” but there is no creator. I used to believe that there is one. I hope I can capture my deep appreciation of life and how I made sense of it in this blog post.

I was born to a poor family in San Ildefonso, a town two hours from Manila, our nation’s Capital in 1985. If I were to have a hand in my fate as to where I should start this life of sacrifice and struggle
markdownRemark.excerpt: We don’t choose our parents. I know most haven’t reflected on the fact that being born to this world is not of our own choosing. Okay…

frontmatter.title: Genetic Lottery and why I became an Agnostic..
